name: Refraction (itch) (Universe Zero)
description:
Jackie Shields wakes up to find everything in her world a little different than she remembers it. Trapped between her own dimension and a parallel one, she soon realizes that nothing can remain unchanged in her life. Not her friends, not her plans, and especially not herself...because the other dimension has a Jackie of its own!

The demo for our game is out now! Please download and enjoy. If you'd like to provide feedback, we have a Google Form you can use:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfkJ3-rrE2tBbShvLM-R9L07AyVR7xrUhKZQFnt...

We're planning on a release by the end of 2019. More details to come!

Here's our Lemma Soft Post: https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=43&t=53299

And here's where you can follow us on Twitter!: https://twitter.com/UniverseZero2
